ch0263_00_olea/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Let’s put forth our best effort today.
ch0263_00_olea/7101_0701_01_10:
Our corporation—the Macro Cosmos Group—is
involved in a wide range of businesses in Galar.
ch0263_00_olea/7101_0701_02_10:
You could say the Galar region has been shaped
by Macro Cosmos—and, of course, Mr. Rose!
ch0263_00_olea/7102_0701_01_10:
When my subordinates come to me for advice,
I have the habit of resolving their issue myself.
ch0263_00_olea/7102_0701_02_10:
But that doesn’t give our employees the
opportunity to grow.
ch0263_00_olea/7102_0701_03_10:
Unlike Mr. Rose, it’s hard for me to trust and
depend on people...
ch0263_00_olea/7103_0701_01_10:
Working with Mr. Rose is challenging but also
very exciting.
ch0263_00_olea/7103_0701_02_10:
I get to stand by his side and watch his intelligence
and grace...
ch0263_00_olea/7103_0701_03_10: And that’s enough to make me happy.
ch0263_00_olea/7104_0701_01_10:
At Macro Cosmos, we train and deploy staff who
are skilled at handling Pokémon in case there’s
an emergency.
ch0263_00_olea/7104_0701_02_10:
As a sizable corporation, we have a lot
of enemies.
ch0263_00_olea/7105_0701_01_10:
There is something about you that sparkles,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0263_00_olea/7105_0701_02_10:
I’m not talking about your Poryphone—I’m
referring to your passion and intelligence.
ch0263_00_olea/7105_0701_03_10:
So, this is what you would call a “diamond in
the rough”...
ch0263_00_olea/7105_0701_04_10:
Oh, nothing. I just remembered something from
my past.
ch0263_00_olea/1701_0702_01_10:
This is a small contribution from me. Please
continue your hard work.
ch0263_00_olea/2501_0701_01_10:
Mr. Rose is enjoying Pasio as a tourist, but I’m
making sure he works, too.
ch0263_00_olea/2501_0701_02_10:
It’s my job as his secretary to let him know when
to switch from his personal to his work life,
when necessary.
ch0263_00_olea/2501_0701_03_10: I feel bad for doing so, but work is work.
ch0263_00_olea/2501_0702_01_10:
Being able to switch between mindsets is essential
for working efficiently.
ch0263_00_olea/2501_0702_02_10: I suggest you learn to while you’re young.
ch0263_00_olea/2511_0701_01_10:
Before I started my current job, I was researching
the Dynamax phenomenon.
ch0263_00_olea/2511_0701_02_10: It was a very intense work environment...
ch0263_00_olea/2511_0701_03_10:
but I was able to devote myself to something I
loved, so it wasn’t that hard.
ch0263_00_olea/2511_0702_01_10:
The world I live in has changed a lot since
Mr. Rose asked me to work for him.
ch0263_00_olea/2511_0702_02_10:
A life-changing moment might happen to you,
too...someday.
ch0263_00_olea/3001_0701_01_10:
Adults have many things to do in the morning.
Children may not understand.
ch0263_00_olea/3003_0701_01_10:
I really have no time to rest. But these busy times
are also very fulfilling.
ch0263_00_olea/3005_0701_01_10:
*sigh* It must be nice to be a child. Children don’t
have to do overtime. I am one tired Oleana...
